menu.title: How do you want to proceed?

beet.text: Ready to broadcast operation to BEET wallet

noDL.title: Via raw Beet deeplink
noDL.step1: Launch the BEET wallet and navigate to 'Raw Link' in the menu.
noDL.step2: From this page you can either allow all operations, or solely allow operation {{opNum}} '{{opName}}' (then click save).
noDL.step3: Once 'Ready for raw links' shows in Beet submit this request.
noDL.label: Enter your account ID

DL.title: Raw deeplink generated
DL.step1: Your BEET deeplink has been generated, click the button to proceed.
DL.step2: A BEET prompt will display, verify the contents then approve the create ticket prompt.
DL.step3: Go to the 'Fetch tickets' page to download your ticket for analysis.

noGen.title: Via local file upload
noGen.step1: 1. Launch the BEET wallet and navigate to 'Local' in the menu.
noGen.step2: 2. At this page either allow all, or allow just operation {{opNum}} '{{opName}}'.
noGen.step3: 3. Once at the local upload page, click the button below to proceed.

generated.title: Local JSON file generated
generated.step1: 1. Your local JSON file has been generated, click the button to download it.
generated.step2: 2. From the BEET Local page, upload the JSON file, a prompt should appear.
generated.step3: 3. Verify the prompt's contents before approving the operations.

failure.text: Prompt failed to broadcast to blockchain.
